name: owncloud
tagline: A self-hosted file sync and sharing platform
description: ownCloud is an open-source platform for file sync and sharing. It offers desktop and mobile clients, user management, versioning, and plugins for collaborative work in self-hosted deployments.

features.title: Mobile Responsive
features.description: Sync files across devices with desktop and mobile clients for seamless access anywhere

features.title: Folder Organization
features.description: Share files and folders with users or groups with granular permission controls and expiration dates

features.title: User Management
features.description: Comprehensive user and group management with LDAP integration and role-based access controls

features.title: Web Interface
features.description: Full-featured web interface for file management, sharing, and administration from any browser

features.title: Mobile Apps
features.description: Native iOS and Android applications with offline access and automatic photo backup capabilities

features.title: Plugin System
features.description: Extend functionality with hundreds of apps including calendar, contacts, and document editing
